backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with user, registration, service, access code, and audit log types used across authorization and internal workflows.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with related files, components, and test IDs for verification tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used across the project for documentation or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point linking the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures React Query, theme provider, and TanStack Router with all application routes including internal and dashboard pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access denied message with branding and a button to return to internal login.
frontend/src/components/AccessGate.tsx: Component that verifies caller user role and status via backend before rendering protected content, with mismatch and denied handling.
frontend/src/components/audit/AuditLogTa: Empty placeholder file for an audit log table component.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple logo component rendering horizontal or icon variants with hardened styling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDel: Gates child components based on whether the user has an active service, showing alerts when loading, error, or inactive.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientLay: Displays the client’s service list with status badges, dates, assistant info, and shared principals.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSer: Form for creating service requests plus a list of existing tasks with request type badges and formatted dates.
frontend/src/components/CopyRow.tsx: Renders a label, read‑only input, and copy‑to‑clipboard button with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/customer-service: Displays a customer service guide with instructions for checking users, services, tasks, and escalation flow.
Read-only service management view with search filtering and detailed service cards.
Shows summary metrics for partners, users, services, and tasks along with a read‑only dashboard intro.
Provides task search, filtering, pagination, and detailed task views for internal tasks.
UI-only form to create and store escalation tickets locally with priority and category fields.
Dialog showing read-only user details including client, partner, and internal data sections.
Provides a read-only user and partner management UI with search, status sections, and a detail panel.
Displays a collapsible list of partners by status with loading/error states and user click handling.
frontend/src/components/DashboardSidebar: Displays a sidebar with a logo and clickable menu items highlighting the active section.
frontend/src/components/internal/asisten: Renders delegation management UI with subtabs for incoming requests and creating delegations.
Form for loading a task and sending a delegation to a partner, including validation and API mutations.
Two-button tab selector for switching between incoming and create delegation views.
Shows incoming task requests with expandable rows and a detail panel.
Displays a loaded task’s basic info and request type badge in a summary card.
Fetches and displays detailed task information with status, metadata, and a close button.
Row component showing brief task info, type/status badges, and expand/collapse behavior.
frontend/src/components/InternalGateGuar: Protects internal pages by checking a session-based access gate and redirecting users to unlock if expired or missing.
frontend/src/components/LandingFooter.ts: Landing page footer with WhatsApp contact link, policy links, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Sticky landing header with navigation links, language toggle, and login/register buttons that react to scroll.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Provides EN/ID language switcher buttons based on current locale.
frontend/src/components/layanan/BuatLaya: Form to create a new service, handle validation, share principals, and assign an assistant, then reset and trigger success callback.
frontend/src/components/layanan/DaftarLa: Displays a table of user services with detail, update, assistant-edit, and deactivate actions, refreshing on trigger.
frontend/src/components/layanan/EditAsis: Modal allowing selection and reassignment of an assistant to an existing service.
frontend/src/components/layanan/LayananD: Read-only modal showing service details including status, dates, and share principals.
frontend/src/components/layanan/LayananU: Modal to edit and save a service's share principals list with add/remove support.
frontend/src/components/layanan/Manajeme: Main management view for services with search, filtering, categorization, and service creation refresh handling.
frontend/src/components/LockedPanel.tsx: Shows a dimmed card with lock icon indicating a feature is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/partner/income/P: Displays partner wallet data with loading and error states, showing balance, earnings, and pending payouts.
frontend/src/components/partner/work/Par: Renders a clickable task card with badges, title, description, and deadline for partner tasks.
Shows a dialog with full task details and actions like accept, reject, and request QA based on task status and tab.
Lists partner tasks or shows an empty state, rendering each task as a PartnerTaskCard.
Provides tabbed views for partner tasks across multiple statuses and opens task details in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a reload prompt with error details.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Activ: Displays a read‑only dialog showing detailed information about a selected active client.
Shows a table of active clients with loading and error handling and allows opening a detail dialog.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Colla: A card section with toggleable expansion for showing or hiding arbitrary content.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Inter: Displays pending internal user registrations in a table with approve/reject actions and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Partn: Shows a dialog with partner performance metrics, handling loading and error states.
Dialog for updating a partner's level and auto-calculated hourly rate, submitting changes via mutation.
Manages partner status lists with actions like approve, reject, suspend, blacklist, reactivate, plus dialogs for details and editing.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Super: Allows viewing and updating internal access codes with validation, loading, and error handling.
Dialog that loads and displays detailed task information including status, type, and timestamps.
Task management UI for superadmins with filtering, period selection, status badges, and task detail dialog integration.
Displays task statistics in a grid of cards with icons and counts.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/Trunc: Renders a truncated principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/UserM: Main user management interface handling user search, partner status sections, active clients, and internal user approval flows.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/UserR: Collapsible table showing users by role with status badges, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/superadmin/UserS: Search bar allowing queries by user ID, principal ID, or name with clear and submit actions.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskListCa: Displays a client task list with request type badges, statuses, and formatted dates using locale‑aware labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAsistenmuAssignmen: Provides stubbed hooks for fetching Asistenmu candidates and assigning them, with mutation error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAsistenmuDelegatio: Provides hooks for fetching and updating Asistenmu task data, including incoming tasks, task details, assignment, and status changes using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientServiceReque: Contains stubbed hooks for creating and retrieving client service requests, with placeholder backend logic and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternalAccessCode: Defines hooks for verifying, fetching, and updating internal access codes, supporting SUPERADMIN operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage authentication state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLayananku.ts: Offers stubbed hooks for creating and managing Layananku service records, including internal, client, and share updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePartnerWallet.ts: Provides a placeholder hook returning a static partner wallet structure until backend support is added.
frontend/src/hooks/usePartnerWork.ts: Contains hooks for partners to fetch their tasks, retrieve task details, and update task status with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Includes user-related hooks for registration, profile retrieval, superadmin claiming, and service fetching.
Implements a search hook mapping UI search modes to backend modes for querying services and clients.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuperadminTasks.ts: Provides hooks for SUPERADMIN to fetch all internal tasks and specific task details.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuperadminUserMana: Defines React Query hooks for superadmin user search and fetching partners, internal users, and customer service users using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Provides a React Query hook to fetch all client tasks for internal roles via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and applies global background and text colors.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports static paths for brand asset images including hero, horizontal logo, and icon.
frontend/src/lib/forms/registrationSchem: Defines TypeScript interfaces and field configurations for client and partner registration forms.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Declares locale types and a large union of translation keys used for frontend internationalization.
frontend/src/lib/partnerWorkSorting.ts: Implements task sorting for partners based on request priority and deadlines.
frontend/src/lib/partnerWorkStatusMappin: Provides mappings for task statuses and request types to UI tabs, badges, and labels, plus filtering utilities.
frontend/src/lib/superadminUserMapping.t: Maps UI partner levels and user statuses to backend enums and provides hourly rate helpers and formatting.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Defines preset WhatsApp messages and utilities to build WhatsApp links for various site sections.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with a sidebar menu that switches between summary, user management, service management, task, and settings views, wrapped in an admin-only access gate.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientDashboar: Client workspace page showing greeting, profile info, services, requests, and delegation tabs with localization support and access control.
frontend/src/pages/internal/AsistenmuDas: Internal Asistenmu dashboard displaying title, description, and the delegation management view behind an access gate for ASISTENMU role.
frontend/src/pages/internal/CustomerServ: Customer service dashboard with a sidebar to switch between summary, user management, service management, tasks, guide, and ticket views, restricted to CS role.
frontend/src/pages/internal/FinanceDashb: Finance dashboard showing localized headers and a placeholder finance card, accessible only to FINANCE role.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRole: Displays a role mismatch warning with a button redirecting users back to the internal login page.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ManagementDa: Management dashboard showing localized headers and a placeholder card, restricted to MANAGEMENT role.
frontend/src/pages/internal/SupervisorDa: Supervisor dashboard with localized titles and a placeholder card, accessible only to SUPERVISOR role.
frontend/src/pages/InternalGatePage.tsx: Implements the internal access gate page with code verification, error handling, and navigation logic.
frontend/src/pages/InternalLoginPage.tsx: Implements internal role-based login flow using Internet Identity and backend role validation before routing to dashboards.
Handles registration for internal roles and customer service users, then validates and routes them to the appropriate workspace.
Displays the platform’s privacy policy with a simple layout and navigation back to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public marketing landing page with hero content, service listings, localized text, and navigation to register or login.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides public login for clients and partners using Internet Identity and redirects based on validated user role.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerBlocke: Blocked account page informing partners their access is disabled and advising them to contact support.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerDashbo: Renders the partner dashboard with menu-based sections, user-status alerts, and redirects blacklisted users.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Supports client and partner registration with form inputs, backend submission, and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/superadmin/Superadmin: Provides the superadmin dashboard with menu-driven views for users, services, tasks, audit logs, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/SyaratKetentuanPage.t: Shows the platform’s terms and conditions with a simple card layout and a button to return to the homepage.
frontend/src/providers/LocaleProvider.ts: Implements a React context for storing and updating the app's locale with persistence to localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing required features, issues, and architecture notes for internal access-code verification and superadmin settings.
